Package org.anchoranalysis.image.core.channel.factory

Class ChannelFactorySingleType

Object
ChannelFactorySingleType
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChannelFactoryFloat, ChannelFactoryUnsignedByte, ChannelFactoryUnsignedInt, ChannelFactoryUnsignedShort
public abstract class ChannelFactorySingleType extends Object
Creates a Channel for a specific data-type.

    • create

      public Channel create(Voxels<?> voxels, Optional<Resolution> resolution)
      Create a Channel from voxels and a resolution.
      Parameters:
      voxels - the voxels, that will be used internally in the created Channel (without duplication).
      resolution - the resolution, if it exists.
      Returns:
      the created channel.
